Maple Pork Chops

Ingredients

  • 2 pork chops
  • 0.5 cup beef stock
  • 0.3 cup maple syrup
  • 2 tsp red wine vinegar
  • 1 tbsp dijon mustard
  • 1 tsp finely chopped rosemary
  • 2 tablespoons butter

Method

  1. Place pork chops into a pan and sear on one side for a few minutes.
  2. Turn chops over and place pan into the oven for
  3. In a bowl mix together beef stock, maple syrup, red wine vinegar, dijon mustard, finely chopped rosemary
  4. Take chops out of the oven, place onto a plate and cover to rest.
  5. Place pan back on the hob, pour sauce mixture in and simmer for
  6. When sauce has thickened, stir in butter
  7. Add chops back into sauce (along with any juices from the plate) and serve.
